name: Niffty Driffty
description:
*THIS IS A BAFTA YGD ENTRY*

In this Game You are on the run from the police, You need to get the most points to make it on the leader board! 

Inspiration:

This game is inspired by a lot of .io games that I have played in the past, I also took inspiration for the ui and color theme from the ui that is popular in mobile games right now (colorful, big buttons, bright).

How to play: 

To play this game all you need to do is open the itch io page and press run! You can control the car with either Arrow keys or WASD, it also kind of “unofficially ” supports a controller but I have only tested that once so it might be a bit buggy! Once you are in the menu just press “Play” and it will take you into the game, QUICK THE POLICE ARE AFTER YOU!

BTW: you increase your score by making the police crash into each other
